title: BRIEF-360 Capital Group Says Priority IPO Offer Of 360 Capital Digital Infrastructure Fund Begins
text:
BRIEF-360 Capital Group Says Priority IPO Offer Of 360 Capital Digital Infrastructure Fund Begins

Stock Markets 54 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 21:11)

© Reuters. BRIEF-360 Capital Group Says Priority IPO Offer Of 360 Capital Digital Infrastructure Fund Begins Oct 9 (Reuters) - 360 Capital Group Ltd : * ANNOUNCES COMMENCEMENT OF PRIORITY IPO OFFER OF 360 CAPITAL DIGITAL INFRASTRUCTURE FUND * FUND IS SCHEDULED TO LIST ON ASX ON 4 NOVEMBER 2019 UNDER THE ASX CODE TDI * FUND COMPLETED INSTITUTIONAL, BROKER FIRM COMPONENTS OF $65.0 MILLION CAPITAL RAISING WHICH WAS OVERSUBSCRIBED AND FULLY UNDERWRITTEN

BRIEF-360 Capital Group Says Priority IPO Offer Of 360 Capital Digital Infrastructure Fund Begins
description: BRIEF-360 Capital Group Says Priority IPO Offer Of 360 Capital Digital Infrastructure Fund Begins
